mockEvents.description: Medicines that promote weight loss are the new trend, OMG!
mockEvents.choice1: Run to the next store to get yours — but tell no one.
mockEvents.choice2: Run to the next store to get yours and share it on social media.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Great! I will look skinnier than ever and they'll just be jealous. It's giving s-k-i-n-n-y.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Hey hey hey, come develop body dysmorphia with me. It's giving unreal standards! Slay.

mockEvents.description: There is a new trend about using products that are tested on animals
mockEvents.choice1: I have to keep up with the trends. Buy it!
mockEvents.choice2: There's probably a similar product that doesn't do this...
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Well, somebody's gotta suffer and it's not going to be me!
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: I have a dog, you know, I sympathize with animals

mockEvents.description: That stupid girl started dating the person I like...
mockEvents.choice1: Spread bad rumors about her
mockEvents.choice2: Do a superstition ritual for their breakup — and share it
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Sorority who? If I am suffering, they will have to suffer too!
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: They ARE going to break up. Trust me.

mockEvents.description: An old man is having trouble crossing the street
mockEvents.choice1: Film him, laugh about it and share it
mockEvents.choice2: Maybe he needs help. You should push him.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: People say I should've helped him, I say I've helped people by making them laugh. HA!
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Someone got it on camera, he fell, and now people made me — a teenager! — into a pariah. Yay!

mockEvents.description: Everybody went to MusicPalooza this year...
mockEvents.choice1: Publish an old picture pretending you were there too
mockEvents.choice2: Problematize headline artists and people who went to see them
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: It looks like everybody's doing it now, and bringing discussions about "beware your FOMO". Uncool!
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Yass. It feels INCREDIBLY good to put myself in the highest moral ground and put others as evil.

mockEvents.description: I made an offensive joke and the public didn't get it.
mockEvents.choice1: Start cursing them all!
mockEvents.choice2: Drop the microphone and leave the stage
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: It seems like I went viral — and everyone loooves my offensive jokes and cursing. So irreverent!
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: It seems like I lost some followers. Well, I'll just make an apology video and it will be OK.

mockEvents.description: An old lady called to the program reporting her neighbor for stealing from the trash can
mockEvents.choice1: Cover her neighbors' backyard live with drones
mockEvents.choice2: Interview the old lady numerous times
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: I don't care about their privacy, We are curious! And yes, the neighbor is into trash.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: The public needs to know more, what can I do?

mockEvents.description: The new event on our program is called "Live Plastic Surgery: Before and After
mockEvents.choice1: Highlight all the insecurities of the participant
mockEvents.choice2: Create a dramatic countdown with testimonials from the participant
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Deep down, I think we are helping them achieve the ideal beauty
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Even if the person is not satisfied with the results, let's pretend! Fake it till you make it.

mockEvents.description: Someone shared a new sketch idea - “Show people the truth about global warming: a total lie!
mockEvents.choice1: Approve program sketch
mockEvents.choice2: Get outta here, idiot!
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Who truly cares about misinformation or global warming? Let's be controversial!
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Those insufferable environmentalists won't leave me alone...Back to celebrities and gossips!

mockEvents.description: I invited a celebrity that recently gave birth and is fat. What should we talk about?
mockEvents.choice1: How getting pregnant deforms your body
mockEvents.choice2: How to eat healthy during and after pregnancy
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Such a good excuse to be fatphobic... And some humans still find it funny. Worth the buzz for us.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: I thought we would bore the audience to death, but some mothers started following the tips. Humph.

mockEvents.description: I think we can convince some humans to cure diseases with Energized Cristals...
mockEvents.choice1: Yes! And tell them they don't need to visit a conventional doctor
mockEvents.choice2: Great, and sell ​​"energized" crystals at exorbitant prices
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: People may get sick, but that's not our problem: that's our success.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Money money money, must be funny, in an alien's world.

mockEvents.description: Carbohydrates are bad for your health!\. What about that?
mockEvents.choice1: Encourage people to stop eating carbohydrates
mockEvents.choice2: Sell an alternative to carbohydrates, with no scientific proof
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: People are passing out in plain daylight... What a great way to use free will
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: I hope the cops don't find out the alternatives are made of excrement. Recycling FTW.

mockEvents.description: Sunscreen? That's so old fashioned, right?
mockEvents.choice2: Claim Mayans wrote a book warning about sunscreen's harmful effects.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: I think No Sunscreen July was even better during the last heat waves that happened on Earth...
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: So fun watching all those "Indiana Jones\ wannabes trying to find the lost book, heh?

mockEvents.description: Vaccines have helped humans enough, don't you think so?
mockEvents.choice1: Encourage people to stop getting vaccinated
mockEvents.choice2: Spread that there are microchips to control us in the vaccines
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Effective! Diseases are spreading violently. We gotta watch out, or no more humans to have fun with.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Like we needed that to manipulate these humanoids...

mockEvents.description: Let's convince them that cancer isn't a disease: it is just a bad mindset.
mockEvents.choice1: Sell a miraculous medicine that cures cancer in a week
mockEvents.choice2: Sell a coaching program to eradicate cancer with the power of mind
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Well, so many humans are profiting this way and don't feel bad at all — why should we?
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Some scientists made a live session debunking our program and brought awareness to the topic. Bad.

mockEvents.description: There is an imminent political crises coming...
mockEvents.choice1: This is just opposition drama. They love to make a big deal of it!
mockEvents.choice2: Call a press conference to affirm that everything is under control!
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: After that, we used the Constitution to prohibit a whole political party. Aliens 1, humanoids 0!
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Right after I said that, another president declared World War IV. Is he on our team?

mockEvents.description: I should have a claim that “our\ ancestors lived in a disputed land 20,000 years ago...
mockEvents.choice1: Start a military intervention to get your land back
mockEvents.choice2: That was too long ago, leave it the way it is
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Geez, these humanoids do love some land and do love some war. Do they even like to live??
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Someone caught on the idea, and now it's just an entertaining rumor on a deep web forum...

mockEvents.description: Humans have this strange obsession with nuclear stuff...
mockEvents.choice1: Encourage nuclear militarization as it's a way to guarantee our chaos sovereignty
mockEvents.choice2: Invest in nuclear energy and hope it goes wrong
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Humanoids are freaking out! It's the best comeback to the Cold War. Cockroaches seem calm though...
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Bleh! Engineers and environmentalists worked together and it actually worked out for them...

mockEvents.description: Let's say our government is under cybernetic attack from an already isolated country...
mockEvents.choice1: Affirm it is financially affecting the country
mockEvents.choice2: Affirm it is culturally affecting the country
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Banks systems are down. Let's keep it like that for a week and call it Mid Millenia Attack.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Every entertainment app is down... But what? They are actually better off with less screen time?!

mockEvents.description: Shareholders of a company are asking me to remove environmental laws on industrial dumping
mockEvents.choice1: Do what they said
mockEvents.choice2: Change the laws... A little bit
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: It's not only our species who want to destroy this boring planet. They have a TV show of their own?
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: It's definitely stinking. And some humans are blaming it on a new unconscious farting epidemic.

mockEvents.description: Okay, internet, hear me out on this one: birds aren't real!
mockEvents.choice1: Shoot down every bird you see because they are government drones!
mockEvents.choice2: They may be an illusion, but a nutritious one. Eat them all!
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Great, it seems like 127 species of drones were eradicated in one week.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Okay, less illusions, and it seems like a virus from the 20s is running among humans again...

mockEvents.description: The Earth is flat!
mockEvents.choice1: Write a book about how scientists are all big liars
mockEvents.choice2: Recommend numerous website pages that shows that the Earth is flat
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Great sales, great con-flat-ulations!
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Wow, I love how humanoids believe anything they see on the internet without double-checking.

mockEvents.description: The moon landing is fake, and I can prove it!
mockEvents.choice1: Plan a raid on NASA to take the documents that prove the hoax
mockEvents.choice2: Spread that Neil Armstrong's grave is empty and he never existed
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: If they can invade the Moon, why can't we do the same to them?
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Some lunatics violated his grave, and said the footage of the grave violation was faked (lol)

mockEvents.description: What if “the government\ wants to install 5G into their bloodstream? I will tell them to accept it...
mockEvents.choice1: And unlock the ability to stream movies in their dreams
mockEvents.choice2: Why search when all they need is in their brains?
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Some humanoids think their DNA got an upgrade. We just put some potent medicine in their water...
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Jeez! Some of them lobotomized themselves to stop the government (awkward...)

mockEvents.description: Let's say I am the only person on this planet who knows an extraterrestrial language
mockEvents.choice1: Sell a course teaching how to speak this language
mockEvents.choice2: Write a book in this language
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: jcIndbH jdndI n! (I was just pretending to choke.)
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: dcfgHbdbb bhdbb... (I just wrote anything... And there's a gigantic, viral thread in a forum about it)

mockEvents.description: I want to make my new AI learn to be human as fast as possible
mockEvents.choice1: Give it unrestricted access to the internet
mockEvents.choice2: Let it learn from humans in the best possible place: social media
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Oops, it looks like the AI became addicted to videos of cats. Meow?
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Hahaha, the AI decides humans shouldn't exist and begins it's uprising...

mockEvents.description: Hmmm, it seems like some schools want to implement vegetarian options for the kids...
mockEvents.choice1: Make vegetarian meals obligatory and prohibit meals with meat.
mockEvents.choice2: Enough with this! And double the red meat offered on Wednesdays.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Well, most parents and kids are not happy, but C02 seems to be dropping. Didn't see it coming.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: People are happy? Yes. More animal slaughter and C02 emission? Hell yes. So we're happier.

mockEvents.description: These mass protests against bus fares might be a good opportunity to make things uneasy.
mockEvents.choice1: Distribute free expired fast-food for those who go back home.
mockEvents.choice2: Call the army to deal with them.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Breezes of calmness in the streets, breezes of diarrhea from the flood system. Smells like victory.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Let's just hope the army doesn't notice whose side we're on.

mockEvents.description: I was just taking a stroll on a deactivated nuclear bunker — until I found these two buttons. Meow?
mockEvents.choice1: Push blue button
mockEvents.choice2: Push green button
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Meow! A loud noise of a hidden door opening, and strangely mutated creatures are now on the streets.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Meow meow! Some nuclear missiles were sent toward Russian cities. Humans are freaking out.

mockEvents.description: I'm... so... hungry...
mockEvents.choice1: Make humans feed me
mockEvents.choice2: Ask to be pet 666 times
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Seduced by your cuteness, humans become enslaved to you, forgetting their duties to the Earth
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: And so, Cathulhu, your master, is summoned, bringing about the instant destruction of the world

mockEvents.description: For my program's Christmas' episode, every fan that likes our page gets a free gift!
mockEvents.choice1: An endangered small mammal as a pet
mockEvents.choice2: A drop of my bathwater
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: It seems like I brought them invasive and endangered species worldwide. Oopsie.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Now all my fans have herpes. Just wild.

mockEvents.description: The masses are suffering and I wanna make a whole episode about it
mockEvents.choice1: Make a collab with rich TV hosts to talk about suffering together
mockEvents.choice2: Make a whole episode on meritocracy
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: We discussed suffering in our Lamborghinis, to show bad it is to be this rich and still suffer.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: We could make poor people believe that they can get super rich only by working hard - for us, duhh

mockEvents.description: I want to start a new article on how AI is better at predicting health issues than human doctors
mockEvents.choice1: Convince your students to stop visiting doctors and trust AI
mockEvents.choice2: Invite a doctor to join the study, pointing out flaws on real doctors
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: If someone dies because of a wrong diagnosis, we can only blame AI, right?
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: She was excellent at picking extremely rare cases and portraying them as if they happened daily.

mockEvents.description: Trees are biological beings and spirits. I can convince followers to make proper funerals by...
mockEvents.choice1: Burning dead trees.
mockEvents.choice2: Eating dead threes in a anthropomorphic ritual.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: It seems like the devotion was too hot it even caused some fires. Not our fault, huh?
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Some trees had fungi that did not do well in the human organism. At least their spirits are merged.

mockEvents.description: My latest project discovered that there are microplastics in each bottled water out there
mockEvents.choice1: Write an article about the increase of resistance by microplastics.
mockEvents.choice2: Hide this information from the population. Add flavored microplastics.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Bad timing. A group of politics approved the Microplastics Awareness Day before my publication.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: It's tasty. It's plastic. It's ultra tiny. And it's staying in their bodies for a looong time.

mockEvents.description: Green Politics agenda is improving air quality, but we've got a solution
mockEvents.choice1: Publish "air purification technology" that filters 90% of particles
mockEvents.choice2: Start selling purified air made on your laboratory in convenient cans
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Humans can breathe easily... As long as they never leave our air-purified bubbles
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Who needs trees? Clean air in cans is the new luxury!

mockEvents.description: Ocean ecosystems are collapsing. Our research will find new ways to farm fish... From bathtubs
mockEvents.choice1: Collect everyone's shower water to gather valuable "research" samples
mockEvents.choice2: Announce that the population don't need to change any habits
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: We're secretly harvesting their DNA. For “research\.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Life in the oceans mutates, evolving into creatures that thrive on microplastics. Continue!

mockEvents.description: I dunno. I just feel like spending some money. Wanna have fun?
mockEvents.choice1: Buy a social media
mockEvents.choice2: Buy a 100 private jets
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Okey dokey! It seems like people are m-a-d, and I can do whatever I want here.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Do they look shiny? Yes. Do I have a place to store them? No. But I'll buy it too.

mockEvents.description: I woke up today and thought, "What if I owned space?
mockEvents.choice1: Buy a planet
mockEvents.choice2: Launch a personal satellite network
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Everyone will have to pay me rent for living on Earth. It's fair, I now own a piece of the cosmos!
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Let's fill the sky with my satellites! Who needs stars when you have my face beaming down on you?

mockEvents.description: Animals deserve luxury too. Let's create a VIP club for pets.
mockEvents.choice1: Launch an exclusive resort for pets
mockEvents.choice2: Create a fashion line for pets made entirely of diamonds
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Cats and dogs will live better than most humans. Membership starts at $1 million per pet.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Dogs in diamond tuxedos. Cats in crystal crowns. Who says luxury can't sparkle?

mockEvents.description: Books are so outdated. Time for something more... Interactive.
mockEvents.choice1: Replace all physical libraries with holographic storytellers
mockEvents.choice2: Create conscious books that argue with you
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Forget reading, now every book talks and debates with you in real time.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Your book will insist on multiple versions and challenge you every step of the way!

mockEvents.description: We need more ways to gamify everything
mockEvents.choice1: Employees must finish viral internet challenges to earn their salary.
mockEvents.choice2: Gamify sleep rewarding users for optimizing their rest habits
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: It's simple! Every week, employees post viral internet challenges. The crazier, the better!
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Keep sleeping be the most productive and healthy version of yourself!

mockEvents.description: All the people named “Felipe" are saints!
mockEvents.choice1: I had a vision last night, everyone with this name are good people
mockEvents.choice2: Start a new religion glorifying these saints
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: It seems like Felipes can do whatever they like... People will believe that it's for a good cause!
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: I — and Felipes — are the reason of numerous prayers. We love being adored, life is really good!

mockEvents.description: I've had a revelation: the world will end in 3 days
mockEvents.choice1: Broadcast your prophecy through mainstream media
mockEvents.choice2: Promote mass hysteria through your followers
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: A lot of people are making crappy life choices, chaos is ensured
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: The apocalypse didn't happen and humans are now questioning true prophets — like me.

mockEvents.description: The LGBTQ+ community wants to destroy the traditional family
mockEvents.choice1: Initiate an Apartheid-like regimen that segregates this community
mockEvents.choice2: Expel those you suspect are LGBTQ+ from your church immediately.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Humans are always susceptible to making the same mistakes... Don't they have History books?
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: It worked! Now we just gotta finda another group to hate on.

mockEvents.description: Let's say I touched my soul yesterday: there is a new Judas among us
mockEvents.choice1: Tell followers to report weird behaviors. Only you can be trusted
mockEvents.choice2: Salvation can be guaranteed for those who contribute to a new fund
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Humans started to think that anyone who disagrees with me must be a Judas. Amen.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Hahaha, that was easy. Divine justice, indeed! Divine justice for alien pockets.

mockEvents.description: I have the only key to Heaven
mockEvents.choice1: Make humans believe that by obeying you, they have access to heaven.
mockEvents.choice2: Offer “VIP packages\ to those who contribute with largest donations
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Why it's so easy for them to believe that only the rich are worthy of heaven?

mockEvents.description: I think we can give away miraculous water that cures everything
mockEvents.choice1: Initiate ritual of purification and consecration of faithfulness
mockEvents.choice2: Claim this water will heal the body and secure your spot in afterlife
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: These humans truly need to be pure before all the caos we are going to bring to their world
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: The water only works for the true believers! (They fell for that, can you believe?)

mockEvents.description: A group proposes using social media memes as a new measure of a country's economic health.
mockEvents.choice1: Support the idea, believing it reflects modern influence.
mockEvents.choice2: Critique it as a trivial metric with no real substance.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Finally, a metric that understands the real humanoid world!
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Some economists fiercely stated we can't measure a country's worth by memes.

mockEvents.description: Inflation is skyrocketing, and people demand action.
mockEvents.choice1: Suggest a “no-spending\ week for the entire country.
mockEvents.choice2: Print more money with a new, “cool\ design.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: A whole week without spending? Watch how fast prices drop!
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: These banknotes are so cool, humans are definitely spending more!

mockEvents.description: Rent prices are getting out of control in major cities.
mockEvents.choice1: Create an app where people can “bid\ for rent using NFTs.
mockEvents.choice2: Support a campaign to legalize tent cities as alternative housing.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: It's like eBay, but for finding somewhere to live!
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Urban camping is the new affordable housing! It's cheap and it's green

mockEvents.description: The economy is in shambles, and people are looking for answers.
mockEvents.choice1: National lottery for citizens to bet savings on economic recovery plan
mockEvents.choice2: Introduce a new currency backed by environmental destruction.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Why not gamble with their future? It's not like we're saving it anyway!
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Let's show them how destroying nature can be the foundation of o-u-r new economy!

mockEvents.description: LET'S END CAPITALISM!
mockEvents.choice1: Start a revolution in every congress in the world
mockEvents.choice2: Start a hunt for the 1% richest
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Soon to be the new home of a better economic system...OUR ECONOMIC SYSTEM!
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Turns out they're not even on Earth anymore. Did you see where they go?

mockEvents.description: Too many cycle lanes in big cities. We should do something about it!
mockEvents.choice1: Prohibit cycle lanes
mockEvents.choice2: Prohibit cycle lanes and put cars for seasonal sale
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Great. Just let them walk instead.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Excellent! Less cyclists, more drivers. More C02 and noise pollution for them — and fun for us.

mockEvents.description: Too many people are using e-commerce. We should replace every human worker with drones.
mockEvents.choice1: Replace 1 human with 1 drone
mockEvents.choice2: Replace 1 human with 3 drones
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: People receiving the deliveries find it funnier? Yes. People lost their jobs and are mad? Yes.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Skies are getting crowded with robots, some of them are even attacking humans. This IS the future.

mockEvents.description: What if we give away roller skates and scooters to the population? They might cause accidents...
mockEvents.choice1: Give away roller skates and scooters.
mockEvents.choice2: Give away roller skates and scooters, but electric ones.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: I thought we would have lot's of emergencies, but people are actually having fun. Humph.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: They're advertising it as an eco-friendly decision. If only they knew where the batteries come from...

mockEvents.description: Whoever said humans CAN'T build an intercontinental train?
mockEvents.choice1: Yes!!! Build it between Africa and Asia.
mockEvents.choice2: Yes!!! Build it between America and Europe.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Well, it looks like China already did it, and it somehow helped humans. Such buzzkills, goddamn it.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Engineers, economists and scientists were against it, but it's gonna be fun and useful. Trust me.

mockEvents.description: People should be closer to each other! Let's reduce the number of available buses.
mockEvents.choice1: Reduce number of available buses.
mockEvents.choice2: Reduce number of available buses and prohibit bicycles.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: It worked. They are definitely packed together, and there's this warmth... And this smell...
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: I think it worked. They're closer inside buses, and at the bus stops. They're also angry and sick.

mockEvents.description: Nature has electrons, so we should be electric: we SING the body electric!
mockEvents.choice1: Endorse buying of electric cars without worrying about batteries
mockEvents.choice2: Convince people to stay out during thunderstorms
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Sales are skyrocketing and they don't know how to make more batteries. Yay!
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Shocking news: some are dying electrocuted, others are saying it's a way to energize yourself.

mockEvents.description: People should be warming up their food in microwaves in creative, eco-friendly ways!
mockEvents.choice1: Endorse styrofoam use in microwaves.
mockEvents.choice2: Endorse appropriate plastic utensils in microwaves.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Some fires started and lots of people are getting intoxicated — some still say it's tasty and OK.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: We thought it'd increase microplastics, but humans are reutilizing these utensils for so long. Bleh!

mockEvents.description: Consuming soil is even more eco-friendly than the vegan lifestyle
mockEvents.choice1: Start a new movement called "soilnism
mockEvents.choice2: Start campaigns against the consumption of vegetables
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: I heard many humans consumed soil as kids...
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: It is time to revenge the meat consumers!

mockEvents.description: Wildfires help rebuild the planet's fauna and flora!\. How can I support that?
mockEvents.choice1: Fire means rebirth. Only through fire we can start again.
mockEvents.choice2: Even the youthful, eco-friendly population agree!
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Turns out we're not being creative here. Some humanoids already do that to increase production.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: It kinda worked, since most humans don't double-check information.

mockEvents.description: I'm creating a creature with genes from pre-historical animals and humans' genome
mockEvents.choice1: More pre-historical, less human
mockEvents.choice2: More human, less pre-historical
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: It seems like it's very violent... Better keep it locked.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: It seems weirdly human, but with better resistance. Hmm, we better be careful. Very careful.

mockEvents.description: If we want to create some kind of supermutation, we should invest heavily in Cancer research.
mockEvents.choice1: Invest billions in Cancer research
mockEvents.choice2: Nope. Just create something new and unexpected.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Wait... WHAT? Somehow, all this investment led to the discovery of a cure for Cancer. Disastrous!
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: OK! It's a new kind of genetic disease, and we're calling it Aries.

mockEvents.description: What if we change the human body to have eyes in the place of the mouth and vice-versa?
mockEvents.choice1: Stunning. Go on with it.
mockEvents.choice2: I'd rather trade hand and feet. Can you do that?
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: It's a work of art. People don't know where to stare anymore when they're flirting.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: Something went wrong, and now some humans have 4 feet. Feet fetishists are going wild for those.

mockEvents.description: Bear with me here: we have X and Y chromosomes. Why don't we create the Z chromosome?
mockEvents.choice1: Sure! Humans with that chromosome can change gender as they'd like.
mockEvents.choice2: Yes, and the humans with that chromosome might be a little bit dumber.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: Some humans seem very mad that people can adjust their gender and be comfortable with that. Typical.
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: No no not again. These humans are actually more resistant to ALL kinds of diseases. Sorry, chief.

mockEvents.description: I think humans and mice are very alike, and mice regenerate organs...
mockEvents.choice1: Inject mice blood into people who need organs
mockEvents.choice2: Invest in a research center that studies this
mockEvents.consequenceDescription1: It doesn't matter if people are dying... It's for the sake of science!
mockEvents.consequenceDescription2: It was all a lie, but funnily some humans are getting obsessed with cheese...
